subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Erik Compton, who advanced through the first stage of PGA Tour qualifying just five months after his second heart transplant, was given an exemption to play the final tour event of the year. Compton, 28, received a sponsor exemption to the Children’s Miracle Network Classic at Disney World on Nov. 6-9.
